mapper.select: SELECT bdate FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(bdate), '%Y%m') = #{bdate}) GROUP BY date_format(from_unixtime(bdate), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY bdate ASC, uid ASC
SELECT signdate FROM jejak.tmplist WHERE (SUBSTRING(signdate,1,4) = #{date1}) AND (SUBSTRING(signdate,5,2) = #{date2}) GROUP BY signdate ORDER BY signdate ASC
SELECT SBBOOK FROM jejak.kscbook0 WHERE SBBOOK LIKE CONCAT(#{bcode}, '%') ORDER BY SBBOOK DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM jejak.kswyonj0 WHERE WYBOOK = #{bcode} ORDER BY WYBOO9 ASC, WYSUNS ASC, WYGUBN ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.yeo WHERE ty = 1 AND bu <= #{bnum} ORDER BY bu DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sbbook FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbbook LIKE #{sbbook} ORDER BY sbbook DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM jejak.KSWYONJ0 WHERE wybook = #{wybook} ORDER BY wyboo9 ASC, wysuns ASC, wygubn ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.YEO WHERE ty = 1 AND bu <= #{bu} ORDER BY bu DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM jejak.YEO WHERE bu <= #{bu} AND ty = 1 ORDER BY bu DESC
SELECT * FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbbook = #{sbbook} LIMIT 1
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.TMPLIST2
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.IBTABLE
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.TMPLIST3
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.TMPLIST5
SELECT * FROM jejak.FDANGA WHERE fpanh = #{fpanh} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM jejak.CDANGA WHERE cgub = 4 LIMIT 1
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.BITABLE8
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST5 WHERE gubn5 LIKE '면지%' AND listid5 = #{listid5} LIMIT 1
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.TMPLIST4
SELECT * FROM jejak.JDANGA WHERE jgubn = 7 AND addi = #{addi} AND pnum <= #{pnum} ORDER BY pnum DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.BITABLE7
SELECT wdboo9 FROM jejak.KSWDESU0 WHERE wdbook = #{wdbook} ORDER BY wdboo9 DESC
SELECT * FROM jejak.CDANGA WHERE cgub = 3 LIMIT 1
SELECT max(uid) AS max_uid FROM jejak.TWONGA

SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{date1} AND a.bdate < #{date2} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK ORDER BY crnum ASC, a.uid DESC

SELECT a.uid, a.listid, a.bdate, a.bucode, a.m1, a.m2, a.m3, a.crnum, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bmyun, b.bnum, b.bprice, b.btype, c.sbpanh, c.sbjanh, c.sbbigo, c.sbinse, c.sbhj04, c.sbcoti, c.sbsbph1, c.sbsbjh1, c.sbsbpg1, (SELECT wcname FROM jejak.KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = m1) AS wcname1, (SELECT wcname FROM jejak.KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = m2) AS wcname2, (SELECT wcname FROM jejak.KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = m3) AS wcname3 FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{date1} AND a.bdate < #{date2} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK ORDER BY crnum ASC, uid DESC LIMIT #{lm_s}, #{lm_t}
SELECT listid, jm, yb, gubn, jcode, jname, colo FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{uid} and (jm != 0 or yb != 0) ORDER BY uid ASC

SELECT a.*, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bmyun, b.bnum, b.bprice, b.btype, c.sbpanh, c.sbjanh, c.sbsbph1, c.sbsbjh1, c.sbsbph2, c.sbsbjh2, c.sbsbph3, c.sbsbjh3, c.sbsbph4, c.sbsbjh4, c.sbsbpg1, c.sbsbpg2, c.sbsbpg3, c.sbsbpg4, c.sbpage, c.sbinse, c.sbhj04, c.sbinji, c.sbjnji, c.sbjjgb, c.sbkc FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{date1} AND a.bdate < #{date2} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.sbbook ORDER BY a.uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbbook LIKE #{jbcode} LIMIT 1
SELECT wccode, wcname, wcjob FROM jejak.KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode > '1001' AND wccode < '6000' ORDER BY wccode asc

SELECT a.uid, a.btype, a.bmyun, a.bcode, a.bname, a.bpanh, a.bnum, a.tbigo, b.sbjanh, b.sbsbjh1, b.sbsbjh2, b.sbsbjh3, b.sbsbjh4, b.sbsbpg1, b.sbsbpg2, b.sbsbpg3, b.sbsbpg4, b.sbbigo, b.sbcoti, b.sbcoti2, b.sbipgo FROM jejak.TMPLIST AS a, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS b WHERE a.uid = #{listid} AND a.bcode = b.sbbook LIMIT 1

SELECT a.bdate, a.m2, a.m3, a.m12, a.m13, a.m5, b.*, c.bname, c.btype, c.bcode, c.bnum, d.sbjlsu, d.sbuprc FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a,jejak.TMPLIST3 AS b, jejak.TMPLIST AS c, jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS d WHERE a.uid=b.listid AND (b.gubn not like '%본문%') AND a.listid=c.uid AND a.bdate >= #{bdate1} AND a.bdate < #{bdate2} AND c.bcode=d.SBBOOK ORDER BY b.uid ASC
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST5 WHERE gubn5 LIKE '표지' AND listid5 = #{listid}

SELECT count(*) as count FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS c, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS d WHERE a.listid=c.uid AND a.bdate >= #{bdate1} AND a.bdate < #{bdate2} AND d.wccode = a.m1 ORDER BY a.bdate ASC, a.uid ASC

SELECT a.bdate, a.bucode, a.pwan, b.bcode, b.bname, b.bnum, b.btype, c.wcname, d.jname, d.jcode, d.t3bigo, (SELECT wcname FROM jejak.KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = a.m1) AS wcname2, (SELECT pannum5 FROM jejak.TMPLIST5 WHERE listid5 = #{uid} AND gubn5 LIKE '%본문%') AS pannum5 FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS c , jejak.TMPLIST3 AS d WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.listid = b.uid AND a.m3 = c.wccode AND d.listid = #{uid} AND d.bucode = a.bucode AND d.gubn LIKE '%본문%'
SELECT * FROM jejak.TMPLIST3 WHERE listid= #{uid} AND gubn LIKE '%본문1%' ORDER BY jm DESC, uid ASC

SELECT a.*, b.bname, b.bnum, b.btype, c.wcname FROM jejak.TMPLIST2 AS a, jejak.TMPLIST AS b, jejak.KSWCUST0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{bdate1} AND a.bdate < #{bdate2} AND a.bucode=0 AND a.listid = b.uid AND a.m3 = c.wccode ORDER BY iwan ASC, uid ASC
SELECT signdate FROM jejak.YEJUNG ORDER BY signdate DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jejak.YEJUNG WHERE signdate = #{signdate} AND bname NOT LIKE ''
SELECT count(*) AS count FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE ${keyfield} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%')
SELECT sbbook, sbname, uid FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE ${keyfield} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') ORDER BY uid DESC LIMIT #{lm_s}, #{lm_t}
SELECT xnum FROM ${database}.IBTABLE WHERE bookcode = #{bookcode} AND fchk = 0
SELECT A.*, B.sbname FROM jejak.INSANG AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS b ON a.bcode = b.sbbook WHERE a.pub = 0 ORDER BY a.bcode ASC
SELECT sbbook, sbname FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbgubn LIKE 'B' ORDER BY sbbook ASC
SELECT sbbook, sbname FROM jejak.KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbpegi LIKE 'P' ORDER BY sbbook ASC
SELECT a.*, b.sbname FROM jejak.YEJUNG2 AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN jejak.KSCBOOK0 AS b ON a.yjbook = b.sbbook WHERE a.yjdate >= #{bdate} ORDER BY a.yjdate ASC, a.yjbook ASC
